text: Hi I'm calling about your ad for the apartment for rent Oh yes Can you give me a little more information please Sure what would you like to know How many rooms does it have It has an L-shaped living room dining room a small kitchen two bedrooms one large bathroom and a small bathroom off the master bedroom How much is the rent It's $600 a month Does it have carpeting No it has hardwood floors through Is there a parking spot Yes there are two spaces available Is parking included in the rent One space is included if you want the other spot you'll have to pay an extra $20 per month What about utilities Heat water and electricity are included you just have to pay for cable and telephone Do I have to sign a lease No you just have to give one month notice if you want to move out Is there a damage deposit Yes it's $300 which is half a month's rent Is it OK to have a pet Small pets are allowed One more thing Is it close to a major bus route Yes there's a bus stop just one block away Great when can I see it How about 2 o'clock this afternoon That's fine Oh I forgot to ask When is it available It's available immediately OK see you at 2 o'clock thanks See you bye
